# autoglue_record_sets (Data Source)

Lists DNS record sets for an Autoglue domain.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain_id` (String) Domain ID (UUID) whose records to list.

### Optional

- `name` (String) Optional name filter. May be relative or FQDN; the server normalizes to a relative name.
- `status` (String) Optional status filter (pending, provisioning, ready, failed).
- `type` (String) Optional RR type filter (A, AAAA, CNAME, TXT, MX, NS, SRV, CAA). Validation is handled by the API.

### Read-Only

- `records` (Attributes List) Matching record sets. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--records))

<a id="nestedatt--records"></a>
### Nested Schema for `records`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `domain_id` (String) Owning domain ID.
- `fingerprint` (String) Fingerprint of desired state.
- `id` (String) Record set ID.
- `last_error` (String) Last provisioning error, if any.
- `name` (String) Record name (relative to domain).
- `owner` (String) Owner marker.
- `status` (String) Provisioning status.
- `ttl` (Number) TTL in seconds.
- `type` (String) Record type.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.
- `values` (List of String) Record values.
